issue.title: Publish metadata from the resource list
issue.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

Following this fix : https://forge.easysdi.org/issues/1333.

A solution has to be found to allow metadata publication from the resource list.
According to the problem met, it seems that a status is missing in the metadata life cycle : a single "validated" status exists, but two are needed "validated by editor" and "validated by publisher".
